name: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Appellee v. Marcus MAYS, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Appellee v. Marcus MAYS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of August, 2009, the appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard T. Brown, Jr., Esq., for Marcus Mays.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Grady Gervino, Esq., for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
977 A.2d 1131
COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Appellee v. Marcus MAYS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 2008.
Decided Aug. 17, 2009.
Richard T. Brown, Jr., Esq., for Marcus Mays.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Grady Gervino, Esq., for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, and GREENSPAN, JJ.
